item.title: Developer Productivity: Why Moving Work Across the Board Matters More Than Perfect Code
item.description: A look at the PR process and how being overscrupulous can harm a team.

item.title: Tech Minimalism: Doing More with Less
item.description: The problem of code explosion in the AI era and why minimalism in software development is more important than ever.

item.title: GCP's Signed URLs & A Browser Oddity
item.description: Learn how to handle GCP signed URLs in browsers, common pitfalls with Content-Type headers, and a solution to the 403 Forbidden error when uploading files to Google Cloud Storage.
